verses.verse: <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> have <S%H2232>conceived<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H3205>born<s%> a <S%H2145>man<s%> child: then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H5079>separation<s%> for her <S%H1738>infirmity<s%> shall she be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
And in the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

And she shall then <S%H3427>continue<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of her <S%H2893>purifying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> she shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> thing, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2892>purifying<s%> be <S%H4390>fulfilled.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> she <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H5347>maid<s%> child, then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> two <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> as in her <S%H5079>separation:<s%> and she shall <S%H3427>continue<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of her <S%H2893>purifying<s%> three <S%H8346>score<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2892>purifying<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> for a <S%H1121>son,<s%> or for a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> she shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeon,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H8449>turtledove,<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>

Who shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for her; and she shall be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from the <S%H4726>issue<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> for her that has <S%H3205>born<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5347>female.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> she be not <S%H4672>able<s%> <S%H1767><s%> to <S%H4672>bring<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then she shall <S%H3947>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtles,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons;<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for her, and she shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
